content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace array at position (0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace at position (0.0, 0.0)
- Furnace at position (2.0, 0.0)
- Furnace at position (2.0, 2.0)

### Copper plate mine at position (x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x1) and a furnace at position(y1)
- Burner mining drill (position x2) and a furnace at position(y2)
- Burner mining drill (position x3) and a furnace at position(y3)

### Electricity generator at position (x)
Consists of:
- Steam engine (position x)
- Boiler (position y)
- Offshore pump (position z)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place.

### Errors related to insufficient ingredients in furnaces
- Check the inventory for required ingredients before operating furnaces to avoid running out of materials. Ensure that the furnaces are supplied with the necessary resources to function correctly.
